name: Twisted Tail
description:
Sinopsis Overcome the guards and the puzzle to escape from the castle!
Hide with the colors of your environment to avoid being caught, but be careful, you may need to activate mechanisms to open doors. Game Jam This game has been made for the Zeno Game Jam which lasted 2 days.
Theme: Now you see me, now you don't. Credits Developers: Marc Romera, Ryan Palazón, Fabio Morini, J. Adrián Guerra.
